name: notifier
description: Notify subscribed users about new messages

scripts.refresh-db: PGDATABASE=postgres CREATE_DB_NAME=notifier_dev node bin/create-db.mjs && node bin/create-schema.mjs && node bin/create-seed-data.mjs
scripts.refresh-db-test: NODE_ENV=test PGDATABASE=postgres CREATE_DB_NAME=notifier_test node bin/create-db.mjs && NODE_ENV=test node bin/create-schema.mjs
